channel.title: Energy Landscape on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Energy Landscape on FinanClub

item.title: EQT
item.description: score:63 Chances: EQT Corporation has entered into an agreement to sell a 40% interest in its non-operated natural gas assets, representing approximately 225 MMcf/d of forecasted 2025 net production. The 2024 outlook for E&Ps largely surprises to the upside with conservative budgets and steady volumes.
